mapper.select: SELECT SUM(SETTLE_DEPT) AS "SETTLE_DEPT" , SELLER_NAME AS "SELLER_NAME" FROM ( SELECT SETTLE_DEPT , SELLER_NO , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SETTLE_DATE) SETTLE_DATE , SELLER_NAME FROM SETTLEMENT JOIN SELLER USING (SELLER_NO)) WHERE SETTLE_DATE = #{month} GROUP BY SETTLE_DATE, SELLER_NAME ORDER BY SETTLE_DATE, SELLER_NAME
